Project Title: Music-App

Designed and developed a modern Music App UI using Flutter, focusing on clean layout, smooth animations, and intuitive navigation. The app includes key screens such as Now Playing, Playlist, Albums, Search, and Artist Profile. The project emphasized pixel-perfect design with scalable widgets and reusable components. It helped strengthen my skills in Flutter UI design, custom animations, and building fully responsive layouts across devices.

Project Title: E-Commerce-UI

Developed a complete E-commerce app UI using Flutter with a focus on modern design, user-friendly navigation, and responsive layout. Key screens include home, product listing, product detail, cart, wishlist, and checkout. This project enhanced my skills in building scalable UI components, managing state efficiently, and creating a smooth user experience with Flutter's widget system. It also reinforced best practices in responsive design and clean code architecture.

Source Code

Project Title: Weather-App

Created a dynamic Weather App using Flutter that displays real-time weather data including temperature, conditions, and forecasts. Integrated with a weather API and focused on clean UI, responsive design, and smooth animations. This project improved my skills in working with REST APIs, handling asynchronous data, and building visually appealing UIs in Flutter. I proactively addressed challenges like error handling, loading states, and location-based data retrieval.

Source Code

Project Title: Chat bot

Developed a custom AI chatbot similar to ChatGPT using Node.js for backend logic, Next.js for frontend UI, PostgreSQL for chat history storage, and Ollama for running local LLMs. Focused on smooth user interaction, message streaming, and session management. This project strengthened my skills in full stack integration, real-time messaging, API communication with LLMs, and efficient database structuring. I proactively solved context retention and latency issues to ensure a seamless chat experience.
